website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Max Infuriate 2 Mid is a versatile shoe designed for both light and heavy players. Its Air Max unit has given wearers superb comfort especially upon landing. The textile upper reportedly retains its shape even after so many uses on and off court. Spending $85 is going to be justifiable if you get a sturdy mid-top basketball like the Air Max Infuriate 2 Mid.
pros: The dual traction pattern of the Nike Air Max Infuriate 2 Mid provides great court grip and control
According to many testers, the Air Max unit at the heel protects their knees and muscles from stress and fatigue
It performs really swiftly like the LeBron James 16th Nike shoe
A lot of buyers are happy that the Nike Air Max Infuriate 2 Mid is only $85
Several users observe that the colorways of these Nike basketball shoes are simple and attractive
A couple of users mention that the mesh upper does not stretch at all and remains without serious blemish even after months of use
The raised midsole and heel counter prevent the foot from slipping out of the footbed
cons: A handful of owners complain that the shoelaces are too short
A few wearers claim the Nike Air Max Infuriate 2 Mid runs long and narrow
Wide-footers observe that the upper textile does not stretch and the fit is quite uncomfortable

customer_reviews.title: There okay but not for the width
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are fine but if you have a big wide foot they are not that comfortable. would have returned them but i didnt wear them until it was to late.
customer_reviews.author: GUTZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fit for My Thin Feet
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a glove and true to their Nike standard size 10 Men's. I got these shes openbox, so what a deal I got!!! And they came in mint just without the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: I went up a half size, just in case. But these shoes are so narrow I can barely get my foot inside. Very disappointed, I've worn nike for many years. But now I've wasted my money on a pair of shoes I can't wear.
customer_reviews.author: SD Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Husbands birthday gift. He loves them.
customer_reviews.text: Got this fir my hubby for his birthday. He loves these shoes. Nicely made and color very nice. Fits well very Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GloGonzales

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great service
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are of great quality and package arrived one day earlier, so we are happy with the service provided by seller. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa #1

customer_reviews.title: Bold and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Light weight and comfortable. Very snug like a glove fit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Brescia

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: My son looks so cool with these shoes on. Very durable for an 11yr old. Fits well. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: But nice
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers was nice I may just have to send one back because of the size
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Nike Shoes
customer_reviews.text: the Nike Men's Air Max Infuriate 2 Mid Basketball Shoe i order are exactly what I expected. They are a prefect fit.
customer_reviews.author: SHAY GRIDER

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t really like it
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t really like it, not as cool as the picture
customer_reviews.author: Parsa-ma

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe....
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable for a Basketball Shoe. Really need Nike to bring back all Leather Basketball Shoes, instead of this Flyknit material...
customer_reviews.author: King J.

customer_reviews.title: Work well
customer_reviews.text: They don't seem like they'd support well, but they do. Long days at work, standing 8 hours a day. They rock
customer_reviews.author: Cammy

customer_reviews.title: awesome support
customer_reviews.text: It feels so supportive to my foot arch just a little too tight around the ball of my footbut still a good shoe
customer_reviews.author: Yhan Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Fits tight at first break into them then they feel comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They do exactly what I expect from quality Nike footwear.
customer_reviews.text: I work out daily with different training methods and I prefer the extra support with a high top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: True to size fitting
customer_reviews.text: Gift for nephew, sizing was perfect. He loves the sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryle Robinson
